english_example_sentence: If I had sat there, I would have seen the beautiful view.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я там сидел, я бы увидел прекрасный вид.
turkish_example_sentence: Orada oturmuşsam, o güzel manzarayı görmüş olurdum.
